title: Force on a current carrying wire

content.question: A straight wire carrying a current <math alttext="I " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is in a uniform magnetic field that is directed out of the page, as shown in the figure. Which of the following best illustrates the direction of the magnetic force on the wire?

choices.label: The figure presents an arrow pointing to the right.
The figure presents an arrow pointing upwards.
The figure presents an arrow pointing to the left.
The figure presents an arrow pointing downwards.

content.answer: The figure presents an arrow pointing to the right.
